episodes.title: After Scientology: Straight Up and Vertical #3
episodes.description:
Here is the third episode of our new weekly show with journalist Tony Ortega about Scientology current events and how we can use these events to discuss cults and post-cult recovery. This week we're talking about the new article that just dropped today in Rolling Stone about Valerie Haney's case against Scientology and the very telling psychological projection that Scientology engages in when attacking critics and ex-members. Enjoy!
